Uses of Package
org.forgerock.openig.filter.oauth2

  • Packages that use org.forgerock.openig.filter.oauth2 
    Package Description
    org.forgerock.openig.filter.oauth2
    This package contains the OAuth2 Token validation filter that acts as an OAuth 2 Resource Server.
    org.forgerock.openig.filter.oauth2.cache
    This package contains classes used to implement an AccessToken cache.
    org.forgerock.openig.filter.oauth2.resolver
    This package defines OpenAM specific logic needed to retrieve an .AccessToken.
  • Classes in org.forgerock.openig.filter.oauth2 used by org.forgerock.openig.filter.oauth2 
    Class and Description
    AccessToken
    Represents an OAuth2 Access Token.
    AccessTokenResolver
    Resolves a given token against a dedicated OAuth2 Identity Provider (OpenAM, Google, Facebook, ...).
    BearerTokenExtractor
    Extracts the bearer token from the request's authorization header.
    OAuth2TokenException
    Represents an exception whilst retrieving an OAuth2 access token.
  • Classes in org.forgerock.openig.filter.oauth2 used by org.forgerock.openig.filter.oauth2.cache 
    Class and Description
    AccessToken
    Represents an OAuth2 Access Token.
    AccessTokenResolver
    Resolves a given token against a dedicated OAuth2 Identity Provider (OpenAM, Google, Facebook, ...).
    OAuth2TokenException
    Represents an exception whilst retrieving an OAuth2 access token.
  • Classes in org.forgerock.openig.filter.oauth2 used by org.forgerock.openig.filter.oauth2.resolver 
    Class and Description
    AccessToken
    Represents an OAuth2 Access Token.
    AccessTokenResolver
    Resolves a given token against a dedicated OAuth2 Identity Provider (OpenAM, Google, Facebook, ...).
    OAuth2TokenException
    Represents an exception whilst retrieving an OAuth2 access token.
